The following Guidance Documents are available from the Agricultural Chemical Incident Response Unit of the Minnesota Department of Agriculture. Please place a check in front of the document(s) you need.

GD7 Voluntary Cleanup/Technical Assistance Program - Types of Written Assurances [Revised 03/99]
GD8 MDA Incident Response Program Overview [Revised 03/99]
